title: To all the Yasuo mains out there
body:
What is a viable build for not only 100% crit chance, but also 2.5 attack speed.

Not that I would ever plan on using such a thing in an honorable 5v5.

Lmao JK. Teach me a way to do that.

Assuming it will involve {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} ,
is there any 4 items that would get this to 2.5 As and 100% critical chance?

or of course any combinations not including them would be cool too.

replies.body:
IE and Statikk already give you 80% crit chance, add crit chance quints and AS marks, run 21/9 masteries (with the AS bonus on crit one), build GA for little tankiness, then Botrk for sustain. Only way to obtain that AS without sacrificing MS and AD is adding 2 zephyrs. You will have 2.496 AS which is like having 2.5. 
I do not find this build viable for late game, but if you are relly ahead in midgame, with this build there should be no endgame.

Ty for your input :D

I actually found a [useful site for builds and stat calculations](http://www.teryd.net/)

I figured one out with  
Berserker Greaves, Phantom Dancer, Statikk Shiv, BoRK, Infinity Edge and Zephyr

with all Attack Speed Quints and Marks, 

and 21/9 Mastery set up.

It's got 2.5 Attack Speed and 100% Crit Chance, as well as 260 AD (without crits) 225% crit damage With an Auto Attack DPS of 1530

[Here is that build](http://www.teryd.net/?app=buildcreator&b=Yasuo&l=18&i=184,177,191,68,190,55&r=5247,5247,5247,5247,5247,5247,5247,5247,5247,5316,5316,5316,5316,5316,5316,5316,5316,5316,5289,5289,5289,5289,5289,5289,5289,5289,5289,5337,5337,5337&m=4111;1,4112;4,4122;3,4132;1,4134;3,4142;3,4144;1,4151;1,4152;3,4162;1,4211;2,4212;2,4221;1,4222;3,4232;1&s=6,4&t=0&) please check it and see how you like it :D
